name: Heartbeat Rescue: CPR+AED MR (Pro)
summary: Advanced functionality for professional education and group training. This version follows the latest CPR guidelines from the American Heart Association (AHA) and is tailored for schools, corporate programs, and professional training. It provides a comprehensive learning and assessment system with enhanced flexibility. This is a subscription-based service. For full access and the best experience, please use it with a stable internet connection.
